attributes.title: This app gave me rabies
attributes.review: I woke up on a Saturday morning with a smile on my face, I approached my phone to check the time (as I always do), all of a sudden I got a notification from this app, I couldn’t quite understand the message so I clicked on it, leading me to opening the app, has I opened the app my phone started to bark at me like a crazy dog. I was reasonably appalled by this insane situation that I dropped my phone. My phone landed on the ground and started to attack me, I ran as fast as I could but my phone eventually caught up to me and bite me in the foot numerous times. I started to foam at the mouth. My boyfriend walked in and smashed my phone, then he took me to the hospital where I was diagnosed with rabies. This app is cursed!!!🤬🧚🏽✨✨✨🧚🏻‍♂️🧛🏼🧞‍♀️✨✨

attributes.title: Scary orange people 😰
attributes.review: So I had downloaded this app and I was very scared because i saw a scary orange man in a suit standing in front of the American flag😭😭 I decided to get off the app and go on tik tok😋but then all of a sudden orange people showed up to my house😰😱They started yelling and praising Donald trump😪😖One of the reviews were talking about the ninjas but luckily they didn’t show up🤪🤩the orange people were trying to make me vote for trump but I grabbed my jet pack and started to smack one of their faces🤬 but then he started crying 😢 he said that trump was holding him hostage and forcing him to come to peoples houses and say that we should vote for trump😞😫but I didn’t want to deal with that so I just deleted the app and luckily they went away😊 I DO NOT RECOMMEND!!

attributes.title: Waoh
attributes.review: I’m sorry but I expected not from a candidate. This app is worse than the mobile game ads. The application is unnecessarily glitchy and bugs me with the constant notifications. I expect more from Trump, too. He promised all these changes and completely discarded is promises and dragged the minorities of the supposed Amerikkka. He’s unstable, unprofessional, unpredictable, and a horrible person in general. My momma always said never trust a white person that tans excessively. I hope he’s run out of office and replace with a better person fitted for the position. Oh, this app is also unsafe due to the excessive data exchange from your device to the servers. The data collectivity is 32x more than  that of Facebook and TikTok combined.

attributes.userName: trust me, im not a bot
attributes.review: it all started after I downloaded the app to support my president 🇵🇷! I got a notification✔️ saying that someone found my location 🏘 on the app 😡 of course I called my local police man 🚓 on it and all they did was murder my innocent black neighbor 😁 ANYWAY after that the president 🟠 showed up at my house 🥵🥳🤪 of course I was fangirling over him🤩 (but I mean who wouldn’t 👁👅👁) BUT he continued to burn my chinchilla ALIVE 🐒 then fly ✈️ the ashes 🕊💨 ALL THE WAY 🚲 to the White House 🤍 to sprinkle the ashes on the roof! 🤍🕊🙊 at first I was mad until I remembered 😲 that our president is a rapist! So he just raped me and everything was fine! Now, the reason I rate the app a 1 1️⃣ is because while all this was happening I had to miss the trump rally 👁😖👁

attributes.title: I WENT BLIND(oh to see without my eyes)😌🤘🏻
attributes.review: So I decided to get this app to see what the heck is going on. Then I opened the app and had a ✨heart attack✨ that proceeded into a 😌seizure😌. All because I saw a huge Oompa Loompa that said make America great again. At that moment I really wished I was 💗helen keller💗. So then I flew all the way to the White House on appa from atla to tell Trump to go ⚡️ bungee jumping⚡️ but make it w i r e l e s s but I was interrupted. I SAW TRUMP GETTING SPRAY TANNED AND I SAW IS 🥐 OH IT WAS MICROSCOPIC. My eyes then started to burn out of the sockets. I decided to not tell Trump that because I was afraid I would become deaf after hearing is 🧚‍♂️disgusting voice🧚‍♂️ so i came up with another plan. I saved Barron and lived happily ever after with him in Mexico so Trump could never get us.

attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review: this app is terribly terrible. i had decided to get it for my loving husband billy bob and when he opened up the app it said he had to sacrifice his soul to be able to use the app. my husband billy bob accepted it and next thing you know, his soul is being sucked right outta him !! the family skunk watched in terror as billy bob was suspended in the air, eyes rolled all the way back, while his literal SOUL was being SNATCHED. the skunk was so scared in fact it sprayed billy bob. we had to run to the store to get tomato sauce to throw it on billy bob while he was suspended in the air. about 3 hours later billy bob finally fell down. he will never be the same again 💔 my poor billy bob is lifeless as i’m writing this right now. 1/10 would not try again

attributes.title: Everyone deserves human rights 🧚‍♂️🌸✨🌈 Everyone but Trump 💫✨🧚‍♂️🥰
attributes.userName: Trump is a rat - im disgusted
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and my dog started humping the Dr Phil mannequin I have hidden under my bed. I was truly upset by this, the app also took 69 minutes to download and I had nothing to do so instead I just put my dog in the toaster. As the app finished downloading, I smelt something fishy, that’s when I realized there were 2838 fish flying through my window. I entered the app and it started playing thee song “Deepthroat”, which was disgusting but at the same time I just wanted to bop to it. This app showed me Donald trumps penis, well at least tried to, there wasn’t much there to see. I am outraged and I will never download this app ever again!!! #mad #Donaldtrumpscheetopenis #Outrage #Renagade

attributes.title: No thanks❤️
attributes.review: I was so excited and looking forward to getting this app and when I Finally got it, it took forever to download, this app is terrible I don’t think this app should be a thing it’s terrible. If you want to be disappointed and scared because when it finally downloaded I got into the app and the first thing I see is a big wrinkly orange 🍊 guy that gave me nightmares so if you want nightmares then you should get this and if you don’t want to go though the same situation as me then don’t get the app trust me you’ll have nightmares for weeks. Also I forgot to say that there were also a group of trump ninjas out side of my house it was a very traumatizing experience for me and my family.

attributes.title: Disgrace
attributes.review: I cannot believe I actually downloaded this app, it is a disgrace. I could not open the app? That is a problem you will have to fix, I asked my dear father to open the app for me, it wouldn’t work. President Trump is a disgrace as well, unfortunately I will be passing away. Downloading this app was a mistake, Therefore I should pass away to remove this mistake from happening again. It would be the only solution, unless....? President trump is no longer president I will forgive myself for what I have done. My family will pass away with me if they have to. America will be great again once Trump is out of the office. Make America great again, dear lord I am sorry for my sin of installing this app, I hope you will forgive me.

This app has made me seriously reconsider my will to live. I want to warn u that Logic and knowledge r completely thrown out the window as soon as u enter the app. Quite frankly, it’s very discriminatory and insensitive towards intellectuals. I was basically told that if I had a single Brain cell I wasn’t allowed to even download this app! Even when I watch trump speak, I need to be in a room with five year olds so they can explain to me what the hell he's talking about. Honestly the Cheeto campaign really needs to start appealing to logical and knowledgeable people. He only tries to appeal to the stupid and i take that as a personal offense. I’m sorry but this app is very exclusive and you would have to burn half my brain for my support!
